action.action-desc: Mr. Lamborn introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit Federal funding for the Corporation for Public Broadcasting after fiscal year 2013.

section.header: Prohibition on Federal funds for Corporation for Public Broadcasting after fiscal year 2013

subsection.text: Section 396 of the Communications Act of 1934 (47 U.S.C. 396) is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.header: Prohibition on Federal funds after fiscal year 2013
subsection.text: No Federal funds may be made available to the Corporation for Public Broadcasting after fiscal year 2013.

subsection.header: Corporation prohibited from accepting Federal funds
subsection.text: Subsection (g) of such section is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2)(A), by inserting subject to paragraph (3)(C), before obtain; and

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking ; and and inserting a semicolon;
in subparagraph (B), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:
accepting funds from the Federal Government after fiscal year 2013.

paragraph.text: in subsection (k)(3)(A)(iv)(II), by inserting through fiscal year 2013 after amounts received; and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by inserting through fiscal year 2013 after every three years thereafter; and
in paragraph (2), by inserting and through fiscal year 2013, after 1989,.
